channel.title: News on Artificial Intelligence Translational Research Lab
channel.description: Recent content in News on Artificial Intelligence Translational Research Lab

item.title: Launching AITR website
item.description: June 1st, 2025, 9:10 PM detail This webpage has been developed to serve as a central repository, making all past and current research conducted by Dr. Thanuja Ambegoda and his lab members openly accessible.
